title: Susan Boyle Gets a Special Jacket from a Movie Star
summary: Susan Boyle, a singer from Scotland, received a special jacket from Timothée Chalamet, a famous actor from Hollywood. Timothée thinks Susan is a hero because she sang beautifully on a TV show called Britain's Got Talent in 2009. He gives jackets to people he admires, like other stars. Susan was happy and thanked him. She said the jacket fits perfectly. Timothée was 13 when he first saw Susan on TV, and he still remembers it. He is making a new movie called Marty Supreme that will come out on Boxing Day. This story shows how people can inspire each other across the world.

keywords.explanation: a piece of clothing that you wear over your shirt
someone who is very brave or admired by others
a person who acts in movies or plays
a TV show where people show their talents

questions.question: Who gave Susan Boyle a jacket?
Why does Timothée Chalamet think Susan is a hero?
options: Because she sang on a TV show
Because she is a movie star
questions.correct_answer: Because she sang on a TV show

questions.question: What is the name of Timothée's new movie?
When did Susan Boyle become famous on TV?
How did Susan feel about getting the jacket?

background_read: Susan Boyle is a singer from Scotland who became famous in 2009 after singing on Britain's Got Talent. Timothée Chalamet is a young actor from America who stars in movies. He admires Susan for her talent and gave her a jacket as a gift. This story is about kindness and inspiration between celebrities.
Article_Structure: WHO: Susan Boyle and Timothée Chalamet
WHAT: Timothée gave Susan a jacket because he thinks she is a hero
WHERE: This happened between Scotland and Hollywood
WHY: To show admiration and inspire others

perspectives.description: Timothée looks up to Susan as a hero for her talent and impact.
